page.title: 18Local Staffordshire dialect.
page.content: We went to interview a gentleman who haslived in this area all his life and he has a very broad Staffordshire accent. When we got there he said: "I donna raelly know owt start" (I don't really know how to start) We asked him what he had been doing,he said: "I've bin up failed,lukt sheap" (I've been up the field to look at the sheep) We said we found it difficult to understand broad Staffordshire and he said: "They doesna cum from rownd ear" (You do not come from round here) "When toe ol farmers get tawlking they cosna tell what they sae" (When two old farmers get talking you cannot tell what they say)
